group_1.textRight: It's been some time since we've had@a sleepover at your place, hasn't it!

group_1.textLeft: Staying up all night in our pajamas and@talking is kind of exciting.

group_1.textRight: It would've been nice if Hitomi and@Homura could have come too.

group_1.textLeft: Hitomi said she had practice,
and Homura also seemed to be busy...

group_1.textRight: That's too bad, but it can't be helped...

group_1.textLeft: Maybe next time...
Well then, let's get started with@something sleepover-like!
...Is what I thought,
but what are normal things to do@at a sleepover...?

group_1.textRight: Let's see... Well, for starters...
How about we take a look through@Madoka's room!
Got any treasures hidden heeere?@Maybe an album from when you were little?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200152:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehh?!
N-no way! That's too embarrassing!
Aww...I lost again...
Sayaka,
even with playing cards, "speed" is@your specialty.
When was the last time I even won...?

group_1.textRight: Madoka, you're so worried about failing,
you're playing your cards only after@putting in some thought, right?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I guess so...

group_1.textRight: I'm moving my hands before I even think.
Though I've made mistakes for it!
That's why, since you put so much thought@into everything,
I think you're amazing.

group_1.textLeft: I-is that so...
Alright, then I want to play lots of games...
...with Mami and everyone next time.

group_1.textRight: Sounds good to me!

group_1.narration: Welcome home...wait, are you okay, Junko?!@You drank too much; let me go get you some water.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, sounds like Mama is back!

group_1.textRight: I should go say hello...

group_1.textLeft: No, you don't have to.
Yesterday I told her that you would be@coming over.
...And besides, if you go see her,@you know she won't let you go for a while.

group_1.textRight: That'd be a little embarrassing, huh.@She'd probably talk to you more though.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, by the way, a little while ago,@Mama was telling me...
...a story about Miss Saotome back in the old days!@Did you want to hear, Sayaka?

group_1.textRight: Of course I do!
AH HA HA, are you SERIOUS?!

group_1.textLeft: Yep, Miss Saotome is so cute, isn't she?

group_1.textRight: Man, we couldn't stop laughing.
It's been a while since the two of us@laughed that hard.

group_1.textLeft: You know, it's fun to play with just@the two of us sometimes, isn't it?
But when we laugh like this,
it makes me wish Homura and@Mami and everyone were here too.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it'd be pretty noisy if Kyoko and@Nagisa were here,
but I think it would be pretty fun.

group_1.textLeft: It kind of makes me want to spread@the fun around to everywhere.

group_1.textRight: Mmhm.

group_1.textLeft: Shall we have a sleepover with@everyone next time?
I'm sure it will be fun!

group_1.textRight: Sure does, let's do it!

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, that's right,
when we do, it would be even more fun if we@invited Iroha and her friends over, too!

group_1.textRight: You can't really fit that many@in this room, can you...?
